summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of the Taylor Mill Sewer in easements to be acquired along the shore of Lake Washington, northeasterly of Rainier Avenue South from South Ryan Street to South Perry Street by constructing a sanitary sewer system, including all necessary sewer pipe, manholes, pumping plants, force mains, and appurtenances, Local Improvement District No. 6369, and authorizing additional money from the Sewer Fund in aid thereof; and amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 97196;
